# Accessibility Checklist

- [ ] Slides readable (min 24pt body, high contrast, limited text per slide)
- [ ] Alt text for images/diagrams provided
- [ ] Color not sole carrier of meaning
- [ ] Transcripts/captions for audio/video
- [ ] Keyboard-navigable resources where applicable
- [ ] Inclusive language and diverse examples
- [ ] Screen-reader friendly exports (semantic structure)
